I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support.
i am an army ranger.

participant_2.background:
I am a white person who is raising my child in an environmentally friendly way.
I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.
I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy.
I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work.
my favorite hobby is playing recreational baseball.

content.text: what's up?
I'm good! Just got done with my workout. You?
Just got home. I'm an army ranger, but I don't get to workout as much as I used to.
Oh wow, that's really impressive! What made you decide to join the army?
I wanted to serve my country, and I also wanted to learn how to be a better person.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great person already, but I'm sure the army has taught you a lot.
Thank you! I'm definitely a different person than I was when I joined.
I'm sure! That's awesome.
What are your hobbies?
I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work. I also enjoy playing recreational baseball.
That's cool! I used to play baseball when I was younger.
Oh, nice! What position did you play?
I played catcher.
That's a tough position! I played first base.
It is a tough position, but I loved it.
I can imagine!
So, what do you like to do with your child?
I like to take them to the park and let them run around. I also like to read to them and play games with them.
That sounds really fun!
It is! I love being a mom.
I'm sure you're a great mom!
Thank you
